website_summaries.verdict: If you're not looking for a deep cleanse, this is a mild, pleasant mask.
pros: The Dead Sea Mud and Clay mask is made of all natural ingredients
Unlike many clay masks, this one hydrates your skin
Works great as a skin treatment before a makeup routine
The clay also comes with a mini spatula for easy application
cons: Some buyers complain that the clay does little besides moisturize

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail mask
customer_reviews.text: So I received a sample size in my iPsy bag I believe...I loved it so much I bought the biggest size I could find! I love how it smells, how it makes my skin feel, and most importantly my skin feels really hydrated and clean after! My favorite mask ever
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: I’m accustomed to spending 3x this product’s price tag on other facial masks, but was never completely thrilled with any. This one, however, I believe is far superior. First, the mask actually works; as it dries you could see pollutants being drawn out. It does minimize pores and it doesn’t dry the face out...so the internal product meets its promises. The external container, a glass jar with spring-type lid, neatly contains a small spatula for application. There are no dried crusties clogging up a plastic container’s cap. In all, this is an excellent product, and if the manufacture doesn’t change anything, I’ll be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product!!!! Will definitely be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many, many mud masks on Amazon and kept eyeballing this one for about 6 months. I wish I had tried it sooner. Can't beat the price, adorable packaging, and most importantly quality of ingredients. My daughter suffers from slight acne breakouts and I'm always detoxing my pores from daily cosmetic use. I loved how it didn't make my skin feel tight and dry after. Did not leave my daughter's sensetive skin irritated. Skin felt and looked very clean and moisturized! Will definitely be repurchasing and using on clients!
customer_reviews.author: Makeupnutz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! I noticed a huge improvement in my ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! I noticed a huge improvement in my skin after using this only twice. I have smalll white bumps (milia) on my cheeks and this mask helps reduce them more than anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bye Blackheads
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask!!!!! I suffer from blackheads on my nose and the first time I used it, Poof! NO MORE BLACKHEADS! My skin also feels very soft and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask, its a little smaller than I thought it would be however. It says to apply a thick layer but I only do a thin one cause if you apply it thick expect to have to wait over an hour for it to dry. It makes my skin feel super soft afterward and I love the way it applies smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Jess Ruggles

customer_reviews.title: Best Mud Mask
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mud mask I’ve ever used! It’s gentle and non-drying, but also very effective at clearing pores. I have combination acne-prone skin and I’ve tried hundreds of products to get rid of my acne. This has worked the best so far! I used it every other day for a week or two and experienced a skin purging. Now I’m almost completely clear. I even had 3 painful cysts start forming, so I put the mud mask on them as an overnight spot treatment. In the morning, 2 were gone and the other significantly smaller. I will buy this mask as long as they sell it!! I finally found something that works to manage my breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. Have been using it for about a year now and my skin always looks and feels great afterwards! Doesn't dry my skin out, makes it look smoother and more balanced (I have oily acne skin normally). Would 100% recommend it to everyone as the perfect mud mask!
customer_reviews.author: Beloved47

customer_reviews.title: love this! My skincare regimen's been the same for ...
customer_reviews.text: Got mine today and just tried it on...oh my gosh, love this! My skincare regimen's been the same for ages, bi weekly peels, monthly microdermabrasion and weekly facial massages...but ever since 6 months ago, i've been plagued with blackheads as of late. The instructions stated for 5 minutes but I left it on for about 25 minutes. My nose still had blackheads but the most apparent ones are most definitely gone! I'm sure with given time, it'll irradiate them all! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: DottedSugar

customer_reviews.title: great on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This feels cool and leaves my skin soooft. I have sensitive skin, so some masks cause it to burn, but this one feels soothing.
customer_reviews.author: dtravelbug

customer_reviews.title: I am SO glad I stumbled upon this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a “fill in” until I had the money to repurchase my staple “Hollywood Glam Glow” mask. I wasn’t expecting too much out of this product, but WOW! The very first time I used it I noticed results. My skin was glowing, clean and all around and a different look. I thought maybe it was just a coincidence, but when I woke up the next morning, I noticed a few spots I was starting to break out in were gone! I am SO glad I stumbled upon this product. I will be using this as my staple now! Forget the pricy masks..this is a life changer!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: No Manual Exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice mask, but the description makes it sound like it'll give a bit of a scrub when you wash it off. It doesn't. The mask has a very silky texture. I was specifically looking for something with a bit of manual exfoliation, so I found this somewhat disappointing. It is a nice enough mask and I'll be using the whole pot, but will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Cope

customer_reviews.title: My face loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for just this. I was so excited to get it. No harsh smells! My face is super sensitive and is prone to break outs so I love using a mud mask once a week to help with the inflammation and redness. I love how the packaging is in a plastic container but it looks glass. I am very clumsy and don't like glass around me. It also comes with a little spatula to apply the product onto the face so your fingers don't have to be muddy too.
customer_reviews.author: Hollymck

customer_reviews.title: Not filled up properly but works!
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review after a week or two about the actual use of the mask but so far giving it 4 stars only because it seems to me missing product. Update: I seriously plan on repurchasing! Helps with slight acne and dark spots. I use it about 2-3 times a week. I am now adding Vitamin C and Rose serum with it. I only hope for a fuller jar next time I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got this mask looking for something aside from the aztec mud mask stuff (which I used as well). This face mask is alright. It takes a while to dry. It does leave my face feeling very clean and smooth after i wash it off. It came with a free code to get their de-puffer pads for under the eyes but getting to the actual sample to inquire about it was seemingly complicated and I eventually just said whatever and skipped that.
customer_reviews.author: galila

customer_reviews.title: Big fail
customer_reviews.text: I love mud masks and clay masks and this one had all the claims that I was looking for. However, it's not one that I would repurchase because the smell is so gross and I didn't see it doing anything to my skin. You're only supposed to leave it on for 5 minutes, which doesn't allow much time for the product to actually work. And when I rinsed it off, my face didn't feel any more clean than before. There's much better similar products out there, so this is a big pass for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christina LeighTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mud mask I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mud mask I have ever tried. It doesn’t dry my face out at all. I had a rash on my face from using some new skincare that was very irritating and after I used this mask it cleared up in a couple of days. It’s very gentle yet effective at removing impurities. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: mandee flyingout

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have the most sensitive skin ever. I have not found a mud mask that doesn’t burn and irritate my skin. I received a tiny sample of this one in my IPSY bag a few months ago and I feel in love. It’s so light and fresh. No strong odor. I had zero burning or redness, which again, is a miracle for me! So I went to their website and ordered a big jar. New customer for life thanks to Ipsy!
customer_reviews.author: Erin McKay

customer_reviews.title: Good small gift boxed and plastic wrapped
customer_reviews.text: I did not use this product I’m giving it as a small gift and picked it specifically for two reasons - it came in a box and bec I buy Dead Sea clay masks in packets and they are the BEST like seriously I notice so much difference in my skin so I’m sure this is the same. I’m even more excited bec the box came wrapped in plastic so that’s great for a gift so she will know, for sure, that it’s brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My son has hit the teenage years with full force! He has really bad acne on his chin and forehead. I started using the mud mask on the problem areas about 3-4 times a week. We have been doing this for a month and it has helped his complexion considerably. We still have scaring from him picking at them but the acne isn't as bad as it was before. This product has worked wonders for us!
customer_reviews.author: B.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome clay mask, but the price is steep
customer_reviews.text: This clay mask is great for my skin. I have combination skin and this hydrates instead of drying me out. It leaves my skin even toned instead of it's normal red and patchy. I got a sample of this from a makeup website and I loved it so much I had to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: its a very nice face mask that hydrates well but on oily skin it kind of doesn't do anything. If you have dry patches it does wonders for that. Or if you have dry skin. It doesn't improve acne, scars, large pores, or wrinkles
customer_reviews.author: Aliesha Knauer

customer_reviews.title: Like Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I am 56 years old. I have always taken care of my skin. I am often mistaken for being in my 40s. I use a vitamin c wash, hyaluronic serum, vitamin c serum and a collegen serum. I use a charcoal scrub a couple times a week. My skin looked good to me. I tried this product before bed with my other routines and I swear when I woke up my skin looked better than it ever did! It glowed, my pores were smaller and my skin incredibly smooth. What a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ike LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and effective
customer_reviews.text: The beeeeest mud mask ever - doesn’t dry out too quick or leave my skin tingly, like others, and I’ve noticed it’s noticeably softer and clearer, and just the packaging and the look of the mask on my skin is calming and therapeutic honestly. Got a sample and loved it, bought it for a friend who deserved a long distance pick me up, and finally caved and bought it for myself because it’s just worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Raffaella Luzi Stoutland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Feels good on the face, I use it for my boyfriends acne and when I get hormonal acne. I don’t recommend using on your nose because I feel like it made it a little worse.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love using this mask! I first recieved this in my ipsy bag, needless to say I fell in love & bought a big ole jar! My skin feels smooth & refreshed after every use! I've got sensitive skin & I've had no problems. Breakouts, or allergic reactions!! ^.^
customer_reviews.author: Rocky miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Dead Sea Mud Mask and I was so excited to try it out because I am such a fan of natural products, they are free of harmful chemicals. This mask is amazing: it's gentle on the skin and I could see and feel the difference after my first application. Thank you for putting a good product on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Tanieka

customer_reviews.title: simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: I dont use this on my face. I use it on my head after I shave and its sooooooooo amazing. The product, its design and its application are simple and the results are perfect. Smooth flawless skin. Simply perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this clay mask for about a year now and I have to admit I love this mask. Clears up blemishes and helps improve the softness of my skin. I usually do a Dead Sea Clay mask once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: Silky, Soft, Supple, Radiant Skin.  Grace & Stella!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product. It feels amazingly cool & refreshing on my skin. Where has this product been hiding? I'm so glad I came across finding this on Amazon and I have not had any skin breakouts. My skin craves Grace & Stella Co. Dead Sea Mask!! I will continue to be a loyal customer. I look forward to other products this company offers! Love it! Love you and your skin. :)

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, when i have a breakout, it reduces the length of time of my breakouts.Also it never dries my skin out like some clay masks have in the past. I have found my holy grail clay mask. If you have teen daughters order extra, bc i promise you won't wanna share it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Starr

customer_reviews.title: Dead Sea Mud
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I love this product my granddaughter uses it more than I do. I've found that the mud is very spreadable and light. Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin so when I was able to put this on mg face without sensitivity, I was excited. It's so smooth and fairly easy to wash off. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, i was close to purchasing this from the actual website but had to pay for shipping. I'm glad I got here. This is my to-go mask for when i feel that my face dry and dirty. Easy to apply and to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mud mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mud mask. I got a trial size in my Ipsy bag and I love the way it makes my skin feel afterwards. But the main reason I use it is because I see a notable difference in my acne the next morning after using it. If I have a huge pimple or redness from the pimple, it’s almost gone after using this.
customer_reviews.author: tattookween

customer_reviews.title: This product Dead Sea mud is wonderful. The product information and the detail of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product Dead Sea mud is wonderful. The product information and the detail of the product is all right. I do love this product. And I will buy it again and I do recommend this product to everyone. And if they have other products by this company I will buy to. It has a a wonderful smell easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt care for it
customer_reviews.text: I am a mask junkie, and this is the only mask ive ever used that i didnt notice anything at all when i used it. Normally after a mask ur face feel soft. With this..nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana

customer_reviews.title: Good for Mosturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for moisturizing your face. It gives your skin a nice clean feeling and makes is really soft. I gave it 4 stars because it doesn’t rid blemishes immediately for me. I still really like it though I just only use it whenever my face is feeling dry. I have very oily skin so if you have dry skin this will probably work best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask leaves my skin very soft and love the container
customer_reviews.author: Bessy menendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product because of how it felt on my skin and right after my skin was feeling soft and not tight! I wish they put this mask in a glass container instead of a plastic container since I’m trying to be sustainable with my skincare. But otherwise, nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Marian P.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mud mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mud mask. I've only used it twice but it does significantly reduce my acne scars. When I used it I noticed that the spots were smaller and not as red. It's definitely something I want to keep in my weekly routine. I plan on buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Glover

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mask!! it was sold on the website so i came to amazon, and found it for a good price!! I was worried about it being an off brand version of the real mask but it’s not!!

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Meh I just got this. The packaging is cute but I opened the container and there is a substantial amount ofproduct missing. Definitely not 7 oz!

customer_reviews.title: I really like how it deep cleans and when you rinse it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it deep cleans and when you rinse it off makes your face feel smooth and soft. Would buy again and highly recommend to other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this face mask
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face mask I’ve ever used! It doesn’t dry me out or leave me flakey like other brands. My face glows and is so soft after using it. It’s very gentle !
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer😏
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I've used it twice now and really like it. Easy to put on and feels wonderful after you take it off. Love the packaging also. Recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best facial
customer_reviews.text: The best! We loved it so much that my son did a live video to show everyone while he had it on. It leaves my skin soft and hydrated and cleans my pores instantly. Rubs off right away.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: i think im in love
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is amazing. My face felt soft all day long and it feels so clean. It came on time and was not damaged at all during transit. I want more of this because it felt so good on my skin I wanted my whole family to experience it
customer_reviews.author: MelBel

customer_reviews.title: Great mask! It works! Will order it again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The mask is easy to apply with the spatula. I used a brush to thin out the mask, although the spatula could be used to do that, it would take more time to do. I received the mask two days within placing my order and it was intact. My face feels smoother and softer after I use the mask. My husband used it to remove a blackhead and the blackhead got smaller. I will definitely order this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Sweeden

customer_reviews.title: Love this mud mask
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Leaves my face super soft and nice. I will buy again

customer_reviews.text: This was wonderful! The smell is pleasing and feels great on my skin. And when I rinsed it off my skin was glowing.

customer_reviews.title: The best thing for my skin is this

customer_reviews.title: It is packaged nicely & smells good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. My daughter loves it. She says it's smooth & has a pleasant smell. It comes in a cute little jar w/ a small spatula for application.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!!

customer_reviews.text: I had a full body breakout after taking strong medication and this product helped me soo much! Thank you and you have a customer for life.

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask.
customer_reviews.text: Great face mask! I have super sensitive skin, this works great but doesn't burn or turn my skin red. Very nice product, great price!

customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Leaves my face soft and smooth. Very creamy consistency and easy to apply. Love the packaging.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! My skin cleared up and feels amazing, I'm literally in awe because nothing has worked this well on my acne prone skin!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I try to use it bi-weekly, can tell a positive difference right after use. I recommend this for men or women who want to take care of their face or skin in a healthy natural way. High quality and will buy again.

As far as a difference, this made none. It did not dry at all and felt like I was smearing lotion in my face. It didn't leave my skin feeling pampered. I've used it a few weeks now and I'm not impressed. It has a plastic like scent to it that I dislike as well.

I noticed a difference after the first use, my face looks and feels so much better, it's softer and smoother. I have already recommend this to friends and will buy more when I run out.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. It's not harsh on my skin and leaves my skin feeling soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bethlehem07

customer_reviews.title: Here's mud in your face! LOL!
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the little jar it's in! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, the product is great. It leaves my skin soft, moisturized and radiant. Smells pleasant and you don't have to use a lot, the spatula helps put on a thin even layer. Also the jar is nice, even after the product is done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! The mask always leaves my face feeling amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in my Ipsy and I had to get the full one! Love it love it
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new mud mask!
customer_reviews.text: I have been loving this mud mask! It leaves my skin soft and it's my 4th day using it and I can already say it's making my makeup go on more smoother I have noticed that the appearance of my pores have shrunk a little bit. I recommend this mud mask!
customer_reviews.author: blanca olivas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like this mask and would recommend it to those who care about removing impurities from the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maxi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I believe that it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love love love this
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love this. It's quick and easy and pain free. I work at a coffee shop so it gets very hot and my face feels greasy so I apply a thin layer before work and and a thicker layer before bed. I then apply rose water! I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoother and clean looking skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, I was first introduced through Ipsy and my skin feels and looks so much smoother 👍🏾😊
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Will make your face feel great during and after
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this mask! It feels great going on, and my skin felt refreshed and exfoliated afterward. It didn't quite dry in the 5 minutes recommended, but overall was a product I would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: ktrela

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, it always makes my skin feel so smooth after! The more you use it, the better it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Tuggle

product_meta.title: Dead Sea Mud Mask Premium Spa Quality (120 mL / 4 oz) – Deep Pore Cleansing Acne Treatment Face & Body - Purify Toxins & Impurities from Skin, Remove Dead Cells & Excessive Oil, Minimize Pores
feature_bullets: 💆🏻 Dead Sea's skin-boosting properties help treat skin problems such as acne, blackheads, whiteheads, redness, scarring or dark spots and bumpy texture. Also great for sensitive skin.

💦 SUPER MOISTURIZING to help minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with spa quality ingredients including Kaolin, Shea Butter, Sunflower Oil, Aloe Vera Juice, Vegetable Glycerin, Jojoba Oil, Hickory Bark Extract, and Calendula Oil. Won't strip your skin of its natural oils or dry out your skin.
🚿 DETOXIFIES BUILT-UP ENVIRONMENTAL TOXINS FROM SKIN & IMPROVES blood circulation for a healthy, vibrant glow.
🌿 HIGH IN SKIN-NOURISHING MINERALS from the Dead Sea that are great for and beneficial to the integrity of the skin and improving overall complexion
💃🏻 🕺🏻 NOT JUST FOR FACE. Can be used on trouble areas of body such as legs and butt to help diminish appearance of cellulite and stretch marks
